Docs.summary: Adds a pending work item to a work batch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is used to add pending work items to a work batch. The `workItem` object added to the batch is associated with `work`, an object that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface. Methods provided by this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> object will be called to handle the eventual commit of the `workItem`. Services use this method to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
